@graph.name: Genome Assembly using PacBio data
@graph.description:
Genome Assembly using PacBio data and Flye assembler

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Genome assembly using PacBio data](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/assembly/tutorials/flye-assembly/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
